RECURRING_BILLING.GENERAL.CUSTOM_PRICE.HINT: If specified, overrides standard product price displayed in product name above. Maintained until Renewal Date.
RECURRING_BILLING.GENERAL.ATTACHED_RES_UNIT: Make a matching Reservation Unit unavailable
RECURRING_BILLING.GENERAL.ATTACHED_RES_UNIT.HINT: The selected Reservation Unit will no longer show on your calendar as available for booking.
RECURRING_BILLING.DATES.NOTICE_DATE.HINT: Notice Date is the date a member informs you that they want to terminate.
RECURRING_BILLING.DATES.NOTICE_PERIOD.HINT: This is the amount of notice a member must give before being allowed to terminate.
RECURRING_BILLING.DATES.NOTICE_REQUIRED_BY.HINT: Notice Required By = Renewal Date - Notice Period
RECURRING_BILLING.RENEWAL_NOTICE_PERIOD.HINT: Send renewal reminder X days before renewal.
RECURRING_BILLING.STATUS_NOTES.STATUS.HINT: Recurring Charges are auto-deactivated according to Termination Date.
RECURRING_BILLING.STATUS_NOTES.STATUS.WARNING: Warning: the sweep for this plan is stopped. No reservations or usage will be swept or billed.
